data.eml:eml: A taxonomic review of the parasitoid wasp genera Furcidentia Zettel and Pseudophanerotoma Zettel (Hymenoptera: Braconidae: Cheloninae) from the Neotropics with the description of four new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kittel, Rebecca N. (2018): A taxonomic review of the parasitoid wasp genera Furcidentia Zettel and Pseudophanerotoma Zettel (Hymenoptera: Braconidae: Cheloninae) from the Neotropics with the description of four new species. Zootaxa 4486 (2): 146-160, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4486.2.4
